component.name: Nook Desktop
component.summary: Nook is an application that plays Animal Crossing hourly themes on the hour.

description.p: Nook used to be a browser extension, however with the changes bought in Chrome Manifest v3, it was decided that the browser extension was too difficult to maintain, and Nook was repurposed into a desktop app.
Features over the browser version include:

ul.li: Multilingual support (English, Spanish, French, German, and Chinese)
Population growing snowy and cherry blossom themes
New horizons rainy and snowy themes
